Reviews.Title: Good TV. Inputs not as described
Reviews.Author: Kyle Weaver
Reviews.Content: So far the quality of the tv is probably about 4 stars. Pretty good picture and sound for my girlfriends light tv use with DVDs & Roku Box.I just want to let people know that the image shown of the inputs on the back is not correct at all! Even the specifications are kind of misleading. The AV in and Component in are both on shared ports. This makes it so one can have only one Component device OR one AV device plugged in at any given time. This doesn't make any difference to my use, just a heads up to people who might need both.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for smaller Bedroom or small rooms.
Reviews.Author: LESSIK
Reviews.Content: I want to preface my review with this statement; I absolutely abhor people that post reviews of products without regard to the proper use of said products. This LG not meant for 1. Videophiles that will criticize every minor flaw in its picture and sound, 2. Large viewing area's, or 3. A top shelf LCD TV. What it's meant for: It's a budget minded, quality LCD TV that is meant for smaller rooms. It will produce a better than average viewing experience, it blows away most equally equipped brands (Hands down!). I connected the LG 32CS460 up to a Bluray player, and a cable box. I was impressed with the picture, although watching fast moving sports from a source like a cable box does not allow this TV to show its true capabilities, it looked better when it was connected to an HD antenna because their was no video tiling or motion blur, the bluray pushed the limits of the 720P TV, but you have to look really close and nitpick any flaws. The sound was more than adequate and has a few added settings that allow additional tweaking for most users listening preferences. It doesn't feature any added Apps, and thank goodness for that. I prefer my added equipment to feature the Apps, that way if it were to break it's often less painful to my wallet to replace. You can buy a decent bluray player with Apps for about $120.00, that's not even half of what this LG will cost to replace. Think of that when you spend more on that TV with App capabilities. Finally, if you are looking for the ultimate viewing experience and are shopping for a sub $300.00 TV, you are a moron(But there's still hope for you). But, if you are looking for a very good TV for a budget minded price point, this TV is going to be a hard one to beat. For my use, it sits perfectly in a teenagers bedroom. This purchase turned out so well I am going to buy another, thank you amazon Prime! I give the LG 32CS460 5 stars because it isn't a pretentious branded product trying to offer something it isn't built for, it's an honest deal at a fair price.

Reviews.Title: LG is fantastic!
Reviews.Author: tommyiii
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great. It pops out at you. The other neat thing about this TV is the capability to swivel from side to side. I highly recommend LG.

Reviews.Title: Bang for your Buck!!!
Reviews.Author: H. Parker Smith III "Parker"
Reviews.Content: I am not one to gush over products I purchase.  So you can imagine my surprise when I sat down to watch TV the other night and realized that I could not find anything wrong with this 32" 720p television by LG.  This is my second LG LCD (the other being 50") and both have amazing quality and clarity.  What is surprising is how much better this 32" tv is when compared to the 50".  I purchased my 50" back in 2007, and since that time the quality has jumped up so significantly that I actually prefer to watch the 32" that I bought at Amazon.com as opposed to the older one.  I am thrilled with this purchase and - at under $300 - I can't imagine a better buy.

Reviews.Title: Great for a Grandma
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Snyder
Reviews.Content: Bought this T.V. as a gift for my 90 year old Mom. It replaced one of the large dinosaurs, it is her first flat screen. She loves it. Even with eye problems she finds that she can see it clearly and hear it clearly also. No problems so far, it was easy to set up and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Eugene
Reviews.Content: So far so good, The picture looks great and love the options. Just ordered the sound bar with wireless sub woofer to improve the sound but other than that I love it so far. hope it holds up well. Was convinced to buy my first lg by my satellite installer and my brother. As of now I would recommend it highly...

Reviews.Title: Good picture quality but 4/5 for poor description on Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: rapgaroo
Reviews.Content: The product itself is a 4.5/5 TV. The image of crisp, sound is okay. However, lack of inputs and outputs on this TV and you need a long narrow screw driver to assemble the TV stand. Otherwise, you won't be able to screw in the bolts! I had to go out and purchase one from Home Depot. Triple XD engine from LG has had an improvement over 2011 models, including LG 32LK330. Consumers who wishes to purchase this product must understand that this model isn't a high-end product. It's more like in between mid-high and high-end. It is definitely better than any other TV products in 32inch range. I personally checked the picture quality in stores myself and it had the most crisp and accurate display of colors. People who wants to buy this product, please see the backside photo! The Amazon's description isn't correct at all!--Update: it's kinda weird but, as per LG's product description says that it is a 1280x720 resolution, when i hook up to the hdmi port, resolution is set to 1360x768. hmm... anyways, HDMI output is great.

Reviews.Title: LG 32-inch TV Review
Reviews.Author: Richard Levine "Geek1"
Reviews.Content: Provides a decent picture and sound.  I have had TV in use only for 4 days so far.  I like the idea that it has variable economy settings. It works best for me at medium. Since I have an electrical use meter, I will be checking the electrical use of this TV. The only problem I had was assembling the base. None of my dozen or so Phillips screwdrivers fit the screw head without too much slack or being able to even turn the screws. I called the customer service, and they advised that it was a metric screw. I went to Home Depot and the clerk pointed out to me that one of their screwdriver sets had a Phillips driver that fit this screw.  I tested it in the store on one of the screws, and it fit perfectly.  Bottomline was I had to purchase two more screwdrivers to add to my already vast collection of tools at a cost of about $10.  So if anyone has a similar problem, they can purchase a DeWalt 2 PC./P. Demolition Drivers set.  Set contains one Phillips and one flathead screwdriver. I have a Panasonic LED TV that I am using the LG to replace.  After a few years of use the Panasonic started the red-light of death symptom.  That is when you turn it on in the morning, it shuts itself off.  You need to plug and unplug the electrical connector to get it to play reliably.  I understand that several brands have this same problem, and that it probably indicates that the power supply needs to be replaced. I surfed the web and found the problem with most brands, but could not find the same with the LG TVs.  Hopefully, the LG does not develop the same problem.  For LG I suggest that they explain in the user manual better what has to be done to be able to use their screws to assmeble the base.  They might also consider including an inexpensive metric system screwdriver with each TV sold in the U.S. I purchased this TV from Amazon, notwithing the screw problem, everything else so far has been more than satisfactory with this transaction. I finally heard from LG customer service.  They suggested that I order replacement screws with part number FAB30016122 from [...].  I completed checking the power consumption at medium-  LG 51 watts, and 95 watts for the Panasonic 32-inch TV it replaced.

Reviews.Title: Set-up presents NO PROBLEM.
Reviews.Author: Simple soul
Reviews.Content: Contrary to what others have reported, I had no difficulty in setting up this TV. A Phillips head screwdriver from an old set of Craftsman screwdrivers that I've used for 40+ years was perfect for the task. I suspect that LG has changed the screws provided to standard. Setup of the TV was pretty automatic, easy, and the set performs perfectly for me.

Reviews.Title: Janie
Reviews.Author: D. Janie Brenay "Janie Brenay"
Reviews.Content: The Television arrived in perfect working order. It was easy to set up. The picture is clear and beautiful. I would highly recomend this item to anyone who is looking for a great television

Reviews.Title: Not a good wall hanger
Reviews.Author: Jeff Taranto
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to hang on the wall of my daughters dorm room at OSU. When attaching the wall hanging bracket on the back, the screws don't seem to anchor into anything substantial, like the frame. The screws attach to the thin plastic covering on the back of the TV and when the TV is hanging on the wall, the back of the TV flexes out due to the weight. What's interesting is I see LG TV's haning all over commercial areas, but they are usually larger TV's. This smaller version is not really made well for wall hanging.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Wiewiora "bike commuter"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for son and helped hook it up.  Currently in his bedroom but will be moving to college apartment in fall.  Has really good picture and enough output connections to hook up to playstation and sound system.  He has been enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Mike T "MBT"
Reviews.Content: This is (believe it or not) my very first HDTV.  I left for a 2 week business trip and before I even arrived my wife left me a voice mail saying that our old tube TV that I bought in college had died, so she was facing 2 weeks with no assistance taking care of our 2 young kids without even a TV to distract them for 30 minutes while she made dinner.  I ordered this because it was the cheapest 32" LED TV that was prime eligible (to get reasonable overnight shipping).It was easy enough to unbox, set up, and hook up the DVD player that my wife (a very no techie) was able to do it on her own with 2 very impatient kids hovering.I wasn't expecting much for this price other than something to hold me over until we finish our built-in cabinets and invest in a nice HDTV for the living room, but I was very pleasantly surprised. This will make a great workshop/bedroom/other TV once we get the big one!  It's already a HUGE improvement in picture quality and sound quality compared to the 32" tube TV that it replaced, but I suppose that's obvious!

Reviews.Title: Great TV LG32CS461
Reviews.Author: LividLeon
Reviews.Content: Many people might wonder why is the tv getting this high rating. Let me help clear the air does this tv have the best picture and sound that I have witness hell no. Why, the price don't expect to get the best products for the cheapest price.But this tv is not a slouch you can adjust backlight, contrast, brightness, sharpness, color, tint, color temperature and other features like dynamic contrast, dynamic color, noise reduction, gamma, black levels, film mode, color gamut, and edge enhancer. There's other preset mode that you may not use because they are not really good. Vivid and standard mode are not preset but you can toggle then in the Off Av mode. I will strongly recommend to use the default intelligent sensor right true this save electricity and extend the tv baclkight by dimming it in dark area so this tv is pleasant to look at even in complete darkness and provide the best picture along with the standard picture mode. Please be advised that the sensor share the same sensor as the remote sensor so if you have something blocking the ambient light like have it in a shelf that is position in way that is blocking the sensor it wouldn't perform efficiently. The picture is great speakers sounds are stunning.Built Quality: 09/10 The screws come with washer and the stand is one of the easiest to assemble and no force required like the Samsung LN32D403 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD HDTV. The Power cable need a slight force to put in but there's no buckling cringing sounds that is heard when putting in the cord.Interface is simple and sophisticated. I have an approximately 15 X 15 feet bedroom and this is more than adequate. The base swivel that's a plus. It features a front panel touch sensitive button. This is good to maintain the smooth finish and not have to feel for button in the back.The major problem I have is there are no outputs I would prefer a 3.5mm output or standard analog output. I would of prefer that instead of touch sensitive button.The TV is approximately 32inch so yes you may see more grains than a 720p at a smaller since the Pixel per inch is lower when standing close to it but not a deal breaker since you don't view that close.The TV that I'm reviewing is the 32CS461 it is exactly like the one displayed by amazon with port variation.Will I recommend this as a budget tv yes.If you find areas are dark don't raise the contrast what contrast does is make dark areas darker and bright areas brighter so you can lower the contrast and raise the brightness and turn off dynamic contrast adjust black levels and gamma. If you are using it in intelligent sensor mode you can only adjust advance features so if you want to adjust normal setting you'll have to change the mode.Check out the pictures I'm passionate about this.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: gopsu13
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Great sound. Navigating on the screen is simple. I haven't had a problem yet and I am completely pleased. Easy directions to put on a stand or mount on a wall.

Reviews.Title: Excelent TV! Not so good audio.
Reviews.Author: Ciceron
Reviews.Content: The TV is very well made, and works beautifully. It serves all of my needs, excellent HD system, and up too 1080! My last TV said it could reach 1080 when I bought it, but in reality it was only a 480. BIG DIFFERENCE! The only problem is that the audio isn't very good. I would recommend some form of sound system to compensate, but regardless, it is a VERY good television. If I could, I would give it a 4.5 stars, but amazon won't let me.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Kat55
Reviews.Content: I hooked this TV up all by myself and I'm not very strong. I picked it up, over my head, to put it high on a shelf. It's light weight, it has great speaker sound, I love the sleep timer for my bedroom. I use it every night! The picture is so clear and has lots of settings to adjust for lighting and the size of your room. Perfect for what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: S. Epps "Savvy Shopper"
Reviews.Content: I bought this T.V. simply as a replacement for an older VIzio that the screen had started to burn out.  It was a Cyber Monday deal and the price was really good.  The screen resolution is great and the colors are nice and saturated.  My only complaint is that there is no output on the T.V., however, the on-board speakers are pretty descent.  I already knew this going into buying it from other reviews, but I figured I'd state that again.  It's extremely light and pretty thin as well.  I prefer a matte screen versus glossy (which this set has a glossy screen) so just be aware that if you have a light in the room at the same level or above the T.V. that the screen will definitely pick it up.  The bezel is also a glossy black so of course finger prints are also glaringly obvious.

Reviews.Title: One thing missing
Reviews.Author: Gsdixon
Reviews.Content: There are no audio outputs. Adding a sound bar has to go back to the source. Everything else is great!

Reviews.Title: LG 32 inch tv
Reviews.Author: M. Campbell
Reviews.Content: I purchased it at a pretty good price. It has great sound and video. Since we don't play games on it ,720 p is perfect. The installation was so simple a 65 yo could do it with ease. Hook up, turn on and within seconds the tv is up and running. Not complicated at all and the actual instllation was done by the tv set...

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: A. Reader
Reviews.Content: Its amazing how far tv prices have dropped. This is a great budget buy if you need a small tv for your bedroom. There are definitely thinner options out there. Up close you can sort of tell its 720p, but at any sort of distance the difference between 1080 and 720 is negligible. It comes with an hdmi cable and the setup could not be easier. I would add, and this comment may seem dumb to some people, that  this tv was a little smaller than I thought it would be. I have a 42" and this one seems much smaller. The 10" really does make a huge difference. This tv will be too small for most normal sized living rooms.

Reviews.Title: LG 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: dmw
Reviews.Content: This TV is great.  My father has had his for several years.  The picture is beautiful and no problems at all.  I used to think Sony TVs were the only good purchase.  I was wrong. He's also moved a few times since the purchase and it now sits comfortably in his room at the nursing home.  Never had any problem moving it anywhere.  Don't need an extended warranty

Reviews.Title: fair priced
Reviews.Author: Thomas Zabka
Reviews.Content: Very happy fair priced product.  Fits well on bedroom wall.  Anything bigger would be too big for our bedroom happy

Reviews.Title: perfect!
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: I went on the LG brand name to chose this TV.  Had to fit in existing entertainment cabinet so listed dimensions were important. Picture and color are excellent from all angles, no side distortion.  Very happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: great investment
Reviews.Author: valerie b.
Reviews.Content: the tv shows great picture and on another plus it came way quicker than i thought iit was worth me spending my money i love it

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Micha S.
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV so I can't honestly compare the quality to other products.  But the price was right; delivery was quick and I am very satisfied with the quality of the picture and sound.  The set-up menus are easy to navigate and the remote (while not back-lit) is easy to use as well.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Candifl
Reviews.Content: This has been a quality television and suits our tv watching needs.  We have had it for a while and it is still in great shape.

Reviews.Title: amazing tv
Reviews.Author: ricardo
Reviews.Content: i still have mine i got in the pakage and it almost look new very good deal i would recomend this tv

Reviews.Title: Great LCD HD quality TV set!!!
Reviews.Author: Eddy
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!!!  It is in my small livingroom area and is the perfect size.  The picture quality is excellent and I have had no issues since I purchased this item.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for watching Movies, TV, Gaming ect.
Reviews.Author: Joshua Ford
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. I have had it for about six months and have yet to have a maitnence problem with it. There is only one inconvinience that I have found with this product and that is the controll buttons on the TV itself. The "buttons" are a touch sensitive make. Sometimes when it is more convinient to turn the TV off by hand it is often dark and I find it hard to locate the touch screen buttons to turn the TV off, let alone the volume or channel controlls. I think there should be a bit of a backlight or a slight bevel where the most used buttons lay. Other than that, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: DeeBo
Reviews.Content: This TV has been perfect for our little exercise room.  We didn't need anything too large or expensive, yet I am still impressed with the quality of this TV.  I would definitely recommend this for someone as a secondary TV in a smaller room.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Coles
Reviews.Content: Love this, Picture quality is excellent!!!  Setup was amazingly easy, following on super prompt delivery.  REmarkably good sound, remarkable since the location does not favor good acoustics.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: Jerry W
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this TV.  It looks great and has all the features that I need for a 2nd TV.  Great size for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Loving It!!!
Reviews.Author: Destiny
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful television.  The picture is amazing and the quality is top of the line.  I was a bit nervous about purchasing a tv online.  I am so used to going into the store instead but the reviews helped me in my decision and the price was better than what I saw at Wal-Mart.  Great purchase!!  We are pleased.

Reviews.Title: works great great value
Reviews.Author: JHM "JHM"
Reviews.Content: TV hooked up easily.  Clear picture.  Good sound.  Everything is great.  I wish it had another HDMI port, but when I bought this I never thought I would need two.Would definitely recommend this to every one

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Sls
Reviews.Content: i wish i bought two :)  great picture, great sound, great options.  I would like another one for outside.  Not sure what tv's are good for outside.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Adrienne Smidt
Reviews.Content: I had a bad experience with this product. I only had it 15 months when the sound in explicitly stopped working, the warranty was only good for a year so LG wouldn't replace it. Would cost  at least $130.00 to fix it so I just bought a new TV. It's a shame, I expected better from LG.

Reviews.Title: picture never adjusted properly
Reviews.Author: OFP
Reviews.Content: never able to adjust picture quality satisfactorily,  picture died 13 months after purchase (one yearwarranty).  not worth the price....

Reviews.Title: wonderful product and warranty
Reviews.Author: cks
Reviews.Content: my second LG tv  Am very pleased with their products.  Will probably not buy any other brand from now on.

Reviews.Title: Great hdtv, especially when calibrated.
Reviews.Author: Novakyad
Reviews.Content: I received this HDTV as a birthday gift and was impressed and amazed with the picture quality. Picture quality wise, its a 4.2 out of five. However, this is better than some if not most of 32 inch hdtvs in its competitive market. The picture stands out and pops. When calibrated this tv shines, good/great color accuracy. Great contrast and good black levels, especially if the model has a va panel, which is the next best thing to plasmas and OLED HDTV in terms of black level. Overall I'm more than happy and pleased with this tv.Below are the calibration settings. Note. Settings may work on other sets, however color was according to blue filter glasses and settings from avs calibration disc.Input. Expert 1Picture size. Just scanEnergy saving. MinimumBacklight. 59Contrast. 84Brightness. 52H sharpness. 55V sharpness. 55Color. 55Tint. R1

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY THIS MODEL!
Reviews.Author: Kc10er
Reviews.Content: Biggest piece of junk of I ever owned.. Love my LG Plasma, but will never buy another LG product again. Since day one I had problems with the TV not turning off (turned back on) so I didn't use it much (and I tried all the suggested solutions). Then I had problems with random static at max volume (TV volume was on 8). This was annoying, to say the least, when trying to fall asleep in bed. I would sell it or return it but I literally ripped it off the wall tonight and pulled the cable connection off the back in the process. Yes, this TV made me so irritated I broke it instead of gather money from it. Take that for what it is worth.

Reviews.Title: NO AUDIO INPUTS!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: I have had my LG 32CS460 for about 6 months, i decided to buy a surround sound system for the television but when i went to install it, i found there was no audio inputs at all, no optical point or no auxput! highly misleading, very disappointed as i was lead to believe by pictures that there was audio inputs on the back

Reviews.Title: Awesome television
Reviews.Author: Jut
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this purchase. Picture and sound quality are much better than anticipated. You can't beat the value on this TV. Zero issues in three months of use.

Reviews.Title: 8 months old now it wont turn on
Reviews.Author: falcom3
Reviews.Content: LG is junk 8 months old now it wont turn on.. lg is not honoring there warranty for 1 year

Reviews.Title: Life's Good with LG
Reviews.Author: L. Keeling
Reviews.Content: We love this television. It is a perfect size for a bedroom.  The picture is clear and it is easy to operate. This flat screen has changed my life for the better. We have only had it a few months but so far we are truly pleased with everything about it.

Reviews.Title: All right
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: It was very good !My customer was happy to see the tv in High Definition, through HDMI !The inputs are many, just like people need !

Reviews.Title: Judder Problems on LG TV's
Reviews.Author: JOSE A TOLEDO
Reviews.Content: JUDDER PROBLEMS, LG TV's have judder problems no matter is 60 Hz or 600 Hz, Even Plasma LG TV's have this judder problem and their technicians cannot be able to solve no matter how many boards replaced, Their customer service is one of the worst

Reviews.Title: love this TV
Reviews.Author: penny massey
Reviews.Content: what a great experience  i love this TV so much i just purchased another one for my guest bedroom.. it can so quick and its  perfect for the money

Reviews.Title: LG 32 "tv
Reviews.Author: A. Mcewen
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV and my only house TV. I read the reviews and everyone was saying how it's for their bedroom or kids room but this is taking pride of place in my living room. The picture is so clear and bright and the sound is amazing. Granted we don't have surround sound or expect movie theater sounds in our living room. The only complaint I have is there are not enough connectors in the back so I have to unplug by dvd cable to re plug in my wii console. I have been told though that I can plug one of these into my cable box so it shouldn't be a deal breaker for anyone (but I have yet to find this out for sure). If you get this around $300 you are laughing because it's a great brand, a good looking slim tv with a great picture and sound quality. I researched tv's extensively and for the price and brand you really can't beat this.

Reviews.Title: Honest deal at a fair price
Reviews.Author: Charity Koehler
Reviews.Content: Good picture and good sound.  So far this has been a great TV and I've had it for about 4 months. If you are looking for a very good TV for a budget minded price point, this TV is going to be a hard one to beat.

Reviews.Title: Super value
Reviews.Author: Jay or Bernadine Collicott
Reviews.Content: This TV is Perfect.  Easy to set up, picture great!  Bought for my husband's birthday, he is delighted with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price!
Reviews.Author: Cam
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV a few weeks ago and I love it!! The picture is very crisp, the sound isn't too bad either. The only cons I can think of are the component and AVI in ports are shared, and there's only one set, so you can only have one device plugged in using these inputs at once, and the stand is a little awkward to put together, you need a long screwdriver to get the front screws in... I just ignored those two tough to reach screws, and the TV is still very sturdy! :)I think this is the best TV on the market in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Pleased!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mike Miller
Reviews.Content: Overall pleased with the product.  Quick ship and easy to set up.  Picture quality is pretty good, but not great.  Perfect bedroom tv for the price.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Bart Catanzaro
Reviews.Content: The TV picture is not that Great, I tried adjusting it but is still not good. I have an older LG TV that has a great picture

Reviews.Title: Lg tv
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Got this 32" LG tv for our 21 year old son. The picture is beautiful, he loves it. Very quick shipping, wish I needed another!

Reviews.Title: SUPER PLEASED
Reviews.Author: Via
Reviews.Content: Was extremely excited when i got this...it took awhile to get here but the condition of it was EXCELLENT!!! I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase!! THANKS

Reviews.Title: LG 32CS460 TV
Reviews.Author: David Cronin
Reviews.Content: The picture quality for non-HD channels was very poor.  And the picture when viewed in a dimly lit room was much too dark to view.  I had to return the TV because of the poor picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: L. Crist "tronicsjunkie"
Reviews.Content: This tv is every bit of what I expected it to be, a good product.  The order came promptly to me.

Reviews.Title: Still good
Reviews.Author: Dwgravely
Reviews.Content: This was actually mailed to my mother first, who accidentally had it tumbling down outside stairs and into a stone, breaking the outside packaging. The product upon being delivered to my home still worked as advertised. I am impressed with modern packaging standards and am thankful for the expedient delivery.

Reviews.Title: great price, great picture
Reviews.Author: yardduck
Reviews.Content: This thing cost (270 beaver pelts) half what the 13 year old crt it replaced did, and the picture is much better.  There is a setting to increase the volume level of the dialog, so it doesn't get drowned out by background music, which is nice.  It doesn't have any svideo or vga inputs so you can't connect most laptops to it to play content or online shows, but I use my roku for most of that, haven't figured out how to stream online shows via websites yet.  I don't know if this is the best tv to hang in your living room, but for my bedroom it is more than enough.

Reviews.Title: Fine TV
Reviews.Author: CBMS,
Reviews.Content: This is a fine TV and has fullfilled my expectations. I will consider more purchases from your group in the near future. Best wishes. Herman Miller

Reviews.Title: LG 32-Inch TV
Reviews.Author: Chester E. Olson
Reviews.Content: Must admit over the years have had many televisons. Some brand names and going back to the days of black and white.And yes I love my LG

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: J. Kowalik "flyingonempty"
Reviews.Content: I could have bought a unit with more inputs for the same price... but... it works fine and the price is good. so I would recommend this supplier.

Reviews.Title: Just a good t.v
Reviews.Author: Justin R Garr
Reviews.Content: I got this for my out door back yard/bar/grill area of my home.it looks good low profile & cheap the image is crisp for a 720 @ 60 hz but i'am happy, really i just need'ed some thing for my bar.i would not buy this as a main t.v unless you do not watch t.v/movies a lot.

Reviews.Title: gr8 product
Reviews.Author: Stumper100 "ROB"
Reviews.Content: Love this product works gr8 no problems with it at all.Love this product works gr8 no problems with it at all.

Reviews.Title: My LG TV
Reviews.Author: Vikki L Harris-Dooley
Reviews.Content: I purchased my tv because I needed one for my bedroom. I like my tv, it was easy to set up and connect to my cable. I'm enjoying this tv very much.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Belinda Floriano
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed that this was sent to my home just in the box it came in,just like i bought it from my local dept. store. unwrapped, no brown paper even on it and this was a Christmas gift.  :(
